title: An Evening with Saara El-Arifi and Rosie Hewlett
description: Saara and Rosie will unpack their new novels and explore what makes mythology and historical retellings so alluring and why it feels more urgent in 2026 than ever before.

title: A Cleopatra Extravaganza: Travel to Ancient Egypt
description: Listen to Saara in conversation with fellow author Nikita Gill, meet her at the book signing and enjoy exclusive activities.
